MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH54 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in Bloom Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 12:47PM. Our engineers are on their way to Livingston Inn substation to investigate and repair a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:30PM on 30 January 2021.
